title: I cant seem to be able to not use CA certificates when connecting to wifi.Is there a way to disable?
content: I've looked at other question similar to mine and some were talking about a security update that locks the option to disable it to force the network host to update their wifi, but I highly doubt the wifi I'm trying to connect to will update any time soon :/. If I can't disable that option, could I rollback the security update?
